OverwatchÂ® 2 is a first-person shooter game developed by Blizzard Entertainment, which suddenly launched on the Steam platform on August 10, 2023. As a sequel to Overwatch, it should have brought more innovation and appeal to the players, but it made them feel disappointed and angry. It just copied most of the content and settings of the previous work, without anything new. Its new heroes, new modes, new skins are all bland and boring, without any characteristics and personality. It made a big change in the game mechanism, which is to change the battle mode from 6v6 to 5v5, and limit each team to only one tank. This change reduced the gameâ€™s balance and pleasure greatly, making the players feel more depressed and dull. It also had many problems in game optimization, such as screen stuttering, high latency, many BUGs, unstable servers, etc. These problems seriously affected the playerâ€™s game experience and mood. It also did not show sincerity and respect to the players, it was a game casually made by Blizzard Entertainment to cope with the sexual harassment scandal within Activision Blizzard or to grab users on the Steam platform. I donâ€™t like this game, nor do I recommend anyone to buy or download this game.
